description: CINECA synthetic cohort Africa H3ABioNet v1

hypertension.description: Has a healthcare worker ever said that you have high blood pressure or hypertension?

hypertension_meds.description: Have you ever taken medication for hypertension/high blood pressure?

age.description: About how old are you? (Only complete when date of birth is unknown)
age.$unit: Enter an integer number and then select unit of measure next.

allOf.description: In which country were you born?

ethnicity.description: What is your ethnic or tribal affiliation?

allOf.description: In which country were you born?

flanguage.description: What is your father's native language?

fethnicity.description: What is your father's ethno-linguistic tribal affiliation?

allOf.description: In which country were you born?

mlanguage.description: What is your mother's native language?

methnicity.description: What is your mother's ethnic or tribal affiliation?

smoke_collectdate.description: Collection date of smoking status information:

smoke_100.description: Have you smoked at least 100 cigarettes in your entire life?

smoke_age.description: How old were you when you first started smoking cigarettes?

kidney_fail.description: Has a doctor or healthcare worker ever told you that you had kidney failure?

kidneys_well.description: If Yes, are one or both working well now?

renal_dialysis.description: Are you currently on renal dialysis?

smoke_perday.description: On the days that you smoke, on average, how many cigarettes do you smoke? OR If you are a former smoker, on the days that you smoked, on average, how many cigarettes did you smoke?
smoke_perday.$unit: Provide average number of cigarettes per day

kidney_transplant.description: Have you ever had a kidney transplant?

smoke_dayspermonth.description: Over the past 30 days, on how many days did you smoke? OR If you are a former smoker, on average, on how many days did you smoke in a month?
smoke_dayspermonth.$unit: Every day smokers or former every day smokers should complete with '30'.

kidney_family.description: Has anyone in your family either had kidney disease or died from it?

kidney_lowfunc.description: Has a doctor ever told you that your kidneys have low function?

kidney_disease.description: Has a doctor or healthcare worker told you that you have a kidney disease?

atrial_fib.description: Have you been told you have/had a heart rhythm problem called atrial fibrillation?

alcohol_any.description: In your entire life, have you had at least 1 drink of any kind of alcohol? (not counting small tastes or sips)

alcohol_age.description: About how old were you when you first started drinking alcohol? (not counting small tastes or sips)

pacemaker.description: Have you got a permanet pacemaker inserted?

alcohol_30days.description: During the past 30 days, on how <u>many days</u> did you drink one or more drinks of an alcoholic beverage?

alcohol_numdrinks.description: On the days that you drank during the past 30 days, how many drinks did you usually have each day? (Count as a drink a can or bottle of beer; a wine cooler or a glass of wine, champagne, or sherry; a shot of liquor or a mixed drink or cocktail.)

rheumatic_fever.description: Has a doctor ever said you had rheumatic fever (inflammatory rheumatisim)?

stroke.description: Were you ever told by a doctor or healthcare worker you had a stroke?

tia.description: Were you ever told by a doctor or healthcare worker you had a TIA, ministroke, or transient ischemic attack?

hiv_tested.description: Have you ever been tested for HIV?

hiv_recent.description: When did you have your most recent HIV  test?

hiv_tx.description: Are you currently on HIV treatment?

cancer_surgery1.description: Did you have surgery for this cancer?

cancer_treat1.description: What kind of treatment did you have?

tb.description: Has a doctor or healthworker ever told you that you have tuberculosis (TB)?

malaria.description: Has a doctor or healthworker ever told you that you have malaria?

sleepingsick.description: Has a doctor or healthworker ever told you that you have sleeping sickness?
